comments:
Hi...i`m facing another problem again. i`m not able to load my web application 
after i edit the source code. Below are the error, after i modify my source 
code, and start tomcat. Is this the compiler problem ? Please let me know the 
solution for this case. thank you

org.apache.jasper.JasperException: Unable to compile 
	at org.apache.tomcat.facade.JasperLiaison.javac(JspInterceptor.java:898)
	at org.apache.tomcat.facade.JasperLiaison.processJspFile
(JspInterceptor.java:733)
	at org.apache.tomcat.facade.JspInterceptor.requestMap
(JspInterceptor.java:506)
	at org.apache.tomcat.core.ContextManager.processRequest
(ContextManager.java:968)
	at org.apache.tomcat.facade.RequestDispatcherImpl.doForward
(RequestDispatcherImpl.java:259)
	at org.apache.tomcat.facade.RequestDispatcherImpl.forward
(RequestDispatcherImpl.java:174)

Are you using org.eclipse.tomcat plugin to deploy your web app, or a third 
party Tomcat plug-in?

Have you edited java classes or JSPs?  Are you compiling JSPs in the workspace 
or letting Tomcat compile them for you?

Created an attachment (id=8009)
Eclipse System Properties

I have attach my eclipse system log file. Please let me know, what is wrong 
with my current settings. Thank You

Yes. Im using org.eclipse.tomcat plugin to deploy my web app. Yes, i did edited 
JSPs, but noy Java Classes. i have try using both method which is compiling 
JSPs in workspace and also letting Tomcat compile them for me.

I still do not understand your scenario.  From the attachement, it looks to me 
like you are using com.sysdeo.eclipse.tomcat not org.eclipse.tomcat.
If I am wrong, please provide more information.  Do you modify help web 
application or run a different one.  How do you start it?

As i mention i can after i edit any files in eclipse and when i rebuilt and 
restart tomcat. Error has been occur, when i try to log into the web 
application, due to the "org.apache.jasper.JasperException: Unable to compile ".

But this problem is solve, after i reinstalled the JDK 1.3.07 into my hdd, and 
i change the setting on the preferences below.

1.Window > Preferences > Installed JREs > add JDK, Remove JRE.

2.Tomcat > Setting JVM > Use JDK.

Thank you for your support.
